apps.name: Butterfly
apps.description: A beautiful insect with wings that are often brightly colored.

apps.name: Pupae
apps.description: The inactive stage of a butterfly's life cycle, where it undergoes metamorphosis.

apps.name: Larvae
apps.description: The caterpillar stage of a butterfly's life cycle, where it eats and grows.

apps.name: Eggs
apps.description: The first stage of a butterfly's life cycle, laid by the female butterfly.

apps.name: Disease
apps.description: A condition that can affect butterflies and their development.

apps.name: Defects
apps.description: Physical abnormalities that can occur in butterflies.

apps.name: Atlas
apps.description: A type of butterfly with large, distinctive wings.

apps.name: Batwing
apps.description: A type of butterfly with wings that resemble bat wings.

apps.name: Clippers
apps.description: A type of butterfly with fast, darting flight.

apps.name: Common Jay
apps.description: A type of butterfly with a common, widespread distribution.

apps.name: Common Lime
apps.description: A type of butterfly that is often found in lime trees.

apps.name: Common Mime
apps.description: A type of butterfly that mimics other species to avoid predators.

apps.name: Common Mormon
apps.description: A type of butterfly that is common in Southeast Asia.

apps.name: Emerald SwallowTail
apps.description: A type of butterfly with emerald green wings.

apps.name: Giant Silk Moth
apps.description: A type of moth with a large wingspan.

apps.name: Golden Birdwing
apps.description: A type of butterfly with golden wings.

apps.name: Grey Glassy Tiger
apps.description: A type of butterfly with grey and glassy wings.

apps.name: Great Eggfly
apps.description: A type of butterfly with large, egg-shaped markings on its wings.

apps.name: Great Yellow Mormon
apps.description: A type of butterfly with yellow wings.

apps.name: Paper Kite
apps.description: A type of butterfly with wings that resemble a paper kite.

apps.name: Pink Rose
apps.description: A type of butterfly with pink wings.

apps.name: Plain Tiger
apps.description: A type of butterfly with plain, tiger-striped wings.

apps.name: Red Lacewing
apps.description: A type of butterfly with red wings.

apps.name: Scarlet Mormon
apps.description: A type of butterfly with scarlet wings.

apps.name: Tailed Jay
apps.description: A type of butterfly with tails on its wings.

apps.name: Ant Bite
apps.description: A type of damage that can occur to a butterfly's wings.

apps.name: Deformed
apps.description: A butterfly with physical abnormalities.

apps.name: Old
apps.description: A butterfly that is nearing the end of its lifespan.

apps.name: Overbend
apps.description: A type of damage that can occur to a butterfly's wings.

apps.name: Stretched
apps.description: A type of damage that can occur to a butterfly's wings.

apps.name: Healthy Pupae
apps.description: A pupae that is healthy and developing normally.

apps.name: Nuclear Polyhedrosis Virus
apps.description: A virus that can infect butterflies.

apps.name: Baculoviruses
apps.description: A type of virus that can infect butterflies.

apps.name: Ophryocystis  Elektroscirrha
apps.description: A parasite that can infect butterflies.

apps.name: Tachinid Flies
apps.description: A type of fly that can parasitize butterflies.

apps.name: Trichogramma Wasps
apps.description: A type of wasp that can parasitize butterflies.

apps.name: Healthy Larvae
apps.description: A larvae that is healthy and developing normally.

apps.name: Molting
apps.description: The process of shedding skin as a larvae grows.

apps.name: Munching
apps.description: The act of a larvae eating.

apps.name: Nectaring
apps.description: The act of a butterfly feeding on nectar.

apps.name: Ovipositing
apps.description: The act of a female butterfly laying eggs.

apps.name: Pudding
apps.description: A type of food that can be used to attract butterflies.

apps.name: Pupating
apps.description: The process of a larvae transforming into a pupae.
